findings.rationale: The absence of indemnification obligations may expose a party to unforeseen liabilities without recourse.
findings.evidence_quote: No indemnification obligations apply under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: Lack of audit rights can limit the ability to verify compliance with the terms of the agreement.
findings.evidence_quote: No audit rights are granted under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: Limiting liability can prevent recovery for significant damages, particularly in cases of negligence.
findings.evidence_quote: Limitation of liability shall not apply to indemnification, except as required by applicable law.
